english.segment1: Twenty two years have passed by. As I contemplate. I can recall you getting me out of every scrape. What comes first to my mind. Was the change that I so desperately needed to make. Day and night, frozen silent in blinding violent fear. A song for my fight. Comes spilling the words I so desperately needed to hear
english.segment2: Do you know this song's for you?. My heart goes out to hurt you feel
